p: The survival of S. granarius exposed to LD 50 of the components varied significantly (log-rank test, χ 2 = 39.88, df = 3, p < 0.001). Survivorship was 99.9% in the control, dropped to 57.6% with lemongrass essential oil, 43.1% with citral, and 25.9% with geranyl acetate ( Figure 3A). Survivorship of S. granarius exposed to lethal dose LD 90 also showed significant differences (log-rank test, χ 2 = 105.91, df = 3, p < 0.001). Survivorship was 99.9% in the control, decreasing to 14.1% with lemongrass essential oil, 7.43% with citral, and 6.58% with geranyl acetate ( Figure 3B).
